name: Corona Borealis MP3 + Wallpapers
detailed_description:
This DLC includes:

  • Full game soundtrack in MP3
  • Wallpapers of all the characters

The OST track list is:
01- Cheerily.mp3
02- Gently.mp3
03- Hopefully.mp3
04- Lightly.mp3
05- Peacefully.mp3
06- Remorsefully.mp3
07- Restlessly.mp3
08- Serenely.mp3
09- Simply.mp3
10- Unnervingly.mp3

short_description: This DLC contains the game original soundtrack in MP3 + Wallpapers with the game characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP and newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.4 and newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
